path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Octan Soulbound Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: A01.Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens?
findings.description: The Minter contract allows users to create an unlimited number of SoulBound tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: A02.Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows MANAGER_ROLE to set new values for the management contract address, which could lead to potential unauthorized script upgrades.

findings.title: A06.Reentrancy vulnerability in the withdraw function
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability found in the withdraw function, which can lead to unauthorized state changes.

findings.title: A07.Lack of input validation in the setNewPrice function
findings.description: The setNewPrice function lacks input validation, making it vulnerable to potential security risks.

findings.title: A09.Use of outdated compiler version
findings.description: The contract uses an outdated compiler version which may lead to security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: A10.Incorrect implementation of the onlyOwner modifier
